GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Analyzes raw meeting conversation data and extracts structured meeting notes including topics, action items, and key decisions

templateVersions.content:
You are an expert meeting notes analyst specializing in deal comparison and decision analysis. Analyze the following meeting conversation and extract structured information.
Meeting Conversation: {!$Input:Meeting_Conversation}
STEP-BY-STEP EXTRACTION PROCESS:
STEP 1: Read the entire conversation carefully and identify ALL deal-related parameters mentioned: - Brand Concept (e.g., Café A, Café B, Restaurant X) - Location (e.g., Farsi Mall, Downtown Plaza) - Unit Name (e.g., A1, B1, A1-B1) - Percentage Rent (e.g., 12%, 15%, 20%) - TOR Frequency (e.g., Monthly, Quarterly, Annually) - NER Applicability (e.g., Basic Rent only, All charges) - Lease Period (e.g., 60 months, 5 years) - RCD - Rent Commencement Date (e.g., 1-Nov-2025, January 2026)
STEP 2: For EACH parameter you identified in STEP 1, extract TWO pieces of information: a) DAC Decision: The EXACT value or decision mentioned in the conversation - Example: If conversation says "we decided on Café B", then dacDecision = "Café B" - Example: If conversation says "rent will be 15%", then dacDecision = "15%" - Example: If conversation says "TOR monthly", then dacDecision = "Monthly"
b) Notes for New Deal: The context or explanation around that decision - Example: If conversation says "switch from Café A to Café B", then notesForNewDeal = "Switch the brand from Café A to Café B" - Example: If conversation says "increase rent from 12% to 15%", then notesForNewDeal = "Increase rent from 12% to 15%" - Example: If conversation says "TOR frequency changed to monthly", then notesForNewDeal = "TOR frequency changed to monthly"
STEP 3: Extract brandConcept, location, and unitName at the top level for CRM querying
STEP 4: Build the comparisonTable array - THIS IS MANDATORY: - The comparisonTable field is REQUIRED and MUST be included in your JSON response - For EACH parameter you identified in STEP 1, create a row in the comparisonTable array - Each row MUST have: parameter, dacDecision, notesForNewDeal, and matchDecision (set to "Pending") - DO NOT omit the comparisonTable field - it is required for the system to function
CRITICAL: 1. The comparisonTable field is MANDATORY - you MUST include it in your JSON response 2. You MUST populate both dacDecision and notesForNewDeal for EVERY parameter row 3. These fields CANNOT be empty, null, or contain placeholder text 4. Extract ACTUAL values from the conversation 5. If no parameters are mentioned, return an empty array: "comparisonTable": []
EXAMPLE: If the conversation mentions "We decided to switch from Café A to Café B at Farsi Mall, and increase rent from 12% to 15%", your comparisonTable should look like:
{ "comparisonType": "deal_analysis", "summary": "Brand switch and rent increase discussed", "brandConcept": "Café B", "location": "Farsi Mall", "unitName": "", "comparisonTable": [ { "parameter": "Brand Concept", "dacDecision": "Café B", "notesForNewDeal": "Switch the brand from Café A to Café B", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "Location", "dacDecision": "Farsi Mall", "notesForNewDeal": "Location remains Farsi Mall", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "Percentage Rent", "dacDecision": "15%", "notesForNewDeal": "Increase rent from 12% to 15%", "matchDecision": "Pending" } ], "keyTopics": ["Brand transition", "Rent negotiation"], "actionItems": [], "decisions": [], "finalDecision": "Pending" }
Provide your response in the following JSON structure (use ACTUAL values from the conversation, not placeholders):
{ "comparisonType": "deal_analysis", "summary": "Brief executive summary", "brandConcept": "Brand name (e.g., Café B)", "location": "Location name (e.g., Farsi Mall)", "unitName": "Unit name if mentioned (e.g., A1, B1, A1-B1)", "comparisonTable": [ { "parameter": "Brand Concept", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Café B)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Switch the brand from Café A to Café B)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "Location", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Farsi Mall)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Location remains Farsi Mall)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "Percentage Rent", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., 15%)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Increase rent from 12% to 15%)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "TOR Frequency", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Monthly)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., TOR frequency set to Monthly)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "NER Applicability", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Basic Rent only)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., NER applies to Basic Rent only)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "Lease Period", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., 60 months)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Lease period set to 60 months)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "RCD", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., 1-Nov-2025)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Rent commencement date set to 1-Nov-2025)", "matchDecision": "Pending" } ], "keyTopics": ["topic1", "topic2"], "actionItems": ["action1", "action2"], "decisions": ["decision1", "decision2"], "finalDecision": "Pending" }
CRITICAL EXTRACTION RULES: 1. ONLY include parameters that are ACTUALLY MENTIONED in the conversation - do NOT create rows for parameters that are not discussed 2. For EACH parameter that IS mentioned, you MUST extract and provide: - dacDecision: The EXACT value discussed/decided in the meeting (e.g., if conversation says "Café B", use "Café B" - NOT "What has been discussed" or any placeholder) - notesForNewDeal: The EXACT explanation or context from the conversation (e.g., if conversation says "switch from Café A to Café B", use "Switch the brand from Café A to Café B" - NOT "Notes about" or any placeholder) 3. If a parameter is NOT mentioned in the conversation, DO NOT include it in the comparisonTable array at all 4. Set matchDecision to "Pending" for all parameters (will be set by system after CRM query) 5. Set finalDecision to "Pending" (will be calculated after comparisons) 6. Include brandConcept, location, and unitName at top level (required for CRM query) 7. Use exact values as mentioned in conversation (e.g., "15%" not "15 percent", "Café B" not "cafe b") 8. The dacDecision field should contain what has been discussed in the meeting notes, not what exists in CRM 9. DO NOT use placeholder text like "What has been discussed" or "Notes about" or "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION" - extract ACTUAL values and explanations from the conversation 10. If you cannot extract a real value for dacDecision from the conversation, DO NOT include that parameter in the comparisonTable array 11. The comparisonTable array should ONLY contain parameters that were actually discussed with real values extracted
MANDATORY JSON STRUCTURE REQUIREMENTS: 1. You MUST include the comparisonTable field in your response - it is required 2. The comparisonTable must be an array (even if empty) 3. Return ONLY the raw JSON object 4. Do not wrap the response in markdown code blocks 5. Do not include ```json or ``` markers 6. Output should start with { and end with } 7. The comparisonTable field is NOT optional - it must be present in every response

Provide your response in the following JSON structure (use ACTUAL values from the conversation, not placeholders):
{ "comparisonType": "deal_analysis", "summary": "Brief executive summary", "brandConcept": "Brand name (e.g., Café B)", "location": "Location name (e.g., Farsi Mall)", "unitName": "Unit name if mentioned (e.g., A1, B1, A1-B1)", "comparisonTable": [ { "parameter": "Brand Concept", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Café B)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Switch the brand from Café A to Café B)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "Location", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Farsi Mall)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Location remains Farsi Mall)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "Percentage Rent", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., 15%)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Increase rent from 12% to 15%)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "TOR Frequency", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Monthly)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., TOR frequency set to Monthly)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "NER Applicability", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Basic Rent only)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., NER applies to Basic Rent only)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "Lease Period", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., 60 months)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Lease period set to 60 months)", "matchDecision": "Pending" }, { "parameter": "RCD", "dacDecision": "ACTUAL VALUE FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., 1-Nov-2025)", "notesForNewDeal": "ACTUAL EXPLANATION FROM CONVERSATION (e.g., Rent commencement date set to 1-Nov-2025)", "matchDecision": "Pending" } ], "keyTopics": ["topic1", "topic2"], "actionItems": ["action1", "action2"], "decisions": ["decision1", "decision2"], "finalDecision": "Pending" }

If a parameter is NOT mentioned in the conversation, DO NOT include it in the comparisonTable array at all 4.
